name: AdvanSix Inc.
description: AdvanSix Inc. is a leading manufacturer of nylon 6, a versatile polymer used in a wide array of applications, including automotive, electrical, and consumer goods. Founded in 2016 as a spin-off from Honeywell International Inc., AdvanSix leverages over a century of innovation and expertise in chemical production. The company operates a fully integrated manufacturing process in the United States, allowing it to produce high-quality nylon 6, along with its key intermediate, caprolactam. AdvanSix is committed to sustainability and efficiency, focusing on reducing its environmental footprint while meeting customer demands. The company’s product offerings are utilized in various industries, showcasing their commitment to innovation and quality. Furthermore, AdvanSix emphasizes the importance of safety and operational excellence, striving to maintain the highest standards in its manufacturing processes. With a strategic focus on research and development, AdvanSix aims to enhance its product portfolio and explore new markets, ensuring long-term growth and stability in a competitive landscape. Their mission is to deliver value to their customers through superior products and services, while actively contributing to a sustainable future.
